title: Yes, that IRS letter you got in the mail is legit | WSOC-TV
author: WSOCTV9
description:
Taxpayers have reached out to Channel 9 saying they received a letter in the mail that looks like it’s from the IRS -- but they don’t want to fall for a scam. Click here for Action 9's advice: https://bit.ly/3l600PJ 

SUBSCRIBE: https://www.youtube.com/user/WSOCTV9/
